abort.no_h264: There were no H.264 streams available. Check the profile configuration on your device.
abort.no_mac: Could not configure unique ID for ONVIF device.

error.no_onvif_service: No ONVIF service found. Check that the port number is correct.
error.onvif_error: Error setting up ONVIF device: {error}. Check logs for more information.

data_description.host: The hostname or IP address of your ONVIF device.

configure_profile.description: Create camera entity for {profile} at {resolution} resolution?
configure_profile.title: Configure profiles

reauth_confirm.description: Some devices will reject authentication if the time is out of sync by more than 5 seconds. If authentication is unsuccessful, verify the time on the device is correct and try again.
reauth_confirm.title: Reauthenticate the ONVIF device

user.description:
By selecting **Submit**, we will search your network for ONVIF devices that support Profile S.

Some manufacturers have started to disable ONVIF by default. Please ensure ONVIF is enabled in your camera's configuration.
user.title: ONVIF device setup

ptz.description: If your ONVIF camera supports PTZ, you will be able to pan, tilt or zoom your camera.

continuous_duration.description: Set ContinuousMove delay in seconds before stopping the move.
continuous_duration.name: Continuous duration

distance.description: Distance coefficient. Sets how much PTZ should be executed in one request.
distance.name: Distance

preset.description: PTZ preset profile token. Sets the preset profile token which is executed with GotoPreset.
preset.name: Preset

speed.description: Speed coefficient. Sets how fast PTZ will be executed.
speed.name: Speed

ptz.name: PTZ

ptz_move.description: Pan and tilt the camera using a relative move.

distance.description: Distance coefficient. Sets how much PTZ should be executed in one request.
distance.name: Distance

speed.description: Speed coefficient. Sets how fast PTZ will be executed.
speed.name: Speed

ptz_move.name: PTZ Move

ptz_zoom.description: Zoom the camera using a relative move.

distance.description: Distance coefficient. Sets how much zoom should be executed in one request.
distance.name: Distance

speed.description: Speed coefficient. Sets how fast zoom will be executed.
speed.name: Speed

ptz_zoom.name: PTZ Zoom

goto_home.description: Move the camera to the configured Home position.
goto_home.name: Goto Home

set_home.description: Set the current position as the Home position.
set_home.name: Set Home

goto_preset.description: Move the camera to a PTZ preset.

speed.description: Speed coefficient. Sets how fast PTZ will be executed.
speed.name: Speed

goto_preset.name: Goto Preset

set_preset.description: Create or update a PTZ preset.
set_preset.name: Set Preset
